IterationsCompensation.SectionContraintes:
<#WHEN VTEST=${FrozeCalibInit}>
eAllParamFiges
</#WHEN>
${CentreFiges} true eCentreFige
${RotationFigees} true eAnglesFiges
${PoseFigee} true ePoseFigee
<#WHEN VTEST=${WithNoPoseFigee}>
0 <#IF VTEST=${WithRotationFiges}> eCentreFige ePoseFigee </#IF>
1 ePoseBaseNormee 0
</#WHEN>

SectionCompensation.EtapeCompensation:
<#WHEN VTEST=${AutoCal}>
eAllParamLibres ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
3 1e10
</#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${CalFigee}>
3 1e10
</#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${UseSpecialParam0}>
${SpecialParam0} ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
Special param : ${SpecialParam0}
</#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${UseSpecialParam1}>
${SpecialParam1} ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
Special param : ${SpecialParam1}
</#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR1}>
eLiberte_DR1 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR1
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR2}>
eLiberte_DR2 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR2
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${LibFoc}>
eLiberteFocale_1 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
Lib FOC
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${LibPP}>
eLib_PP_CD_10 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
<#WHEN VTEST=${LibCD}>
eLib_PP_CD_Lies 1e-5 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
</#WHEN>
Lib PP
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR3}>
.* 0.90 true true
eLiberte_DR3 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR3
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${LibCD}>
<#IF VTEST=${LibPP}> eLib_PP_CD_11 eLib_PP_CD_01 </#IF> ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB CD
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoPolyn1}>
.* 0.95 true true
eLiberte_Phgr_Std_Aff eLiberteParamDeg_1 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB Polyn1
</#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${LibDec}>
eLiberte_Dec1 eLiberte_Phgr_Std_Dec ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB Decentrik
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR4}>
eLiberte_DR4 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR4
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR5}>
eLiberte_DR5 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR5
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoPolyn2}>
eLiberteParamDeg_2 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB Polyn2
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${DoPolyn3}>
eLiberteParamDeg_3 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB Polyn3

eLiberteParamDeg_4 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB Polyn4

LIB Polyn5

LIB Polyn6

eLiberteParamDeg_7 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB Polyn7
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR6}>
eLiberte_DR6 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR6
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR7}>
eLiberte_DR7 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR7
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR8}>
eLiberte_DR8 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR8
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoDR9}>
eLiberte_DR9 ${CalibFigee} ${CalibLibre}
LIB DR9
<#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}> </#WHEN> </#WHEN>
Id_Pastis_Hom
1.0 eNSM_Paquet 100 50 4 eL1Secured
<#WHEN VTEST=${WithBloc}>

${PdsBlocTr0_Glob} ${PdsBlocRot0_Glob} ${PdsBlocTrFin_Glob} ${PdsBlocRotFin_Glob}

${PdsBlocTr0_DistGlob} ${PdsBlocTrFin_DistGlob}
1.0 1.0
</#WHEN>
</#WHEN>

.* ${TetaLVM} true
0 1 2
.* ${CentreLVM} true
true
.* ${IntrLVM1000} true

0.06 0.031 0.017 0.01
0.006 0.0031 0.0017 0.001 0.006 </#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${AffineAll}>
</#WHEN> </#IF>
Id_Pastis_Hom
1.0 eNSM_Paquet 100 eL1Secured 2.0 ${EcartMaxFin}
${RapTxt}
<#WHEN VTEST=${WithBloc}>
TheBlock false <#WHEN VTEST=${WithBloc_Glob}>
${PdsBlocTr0_Glob} ${PdsBlocRot0_Glob} ${PdsBlocTrFin_Glob} ${PdsBlocRotFin_Glob}
</#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${WithBloc_TimeRel}>

</#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${WithBloc_TimeRel}>

</#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${WithBloc_DistGlob}>
${PdsBlocTr0_DistGlob} ${PdsBlocTrFin_DistGlob}
1.0 1.0
</#WHEN>
</#WHEN>

<#WHEN VTEST=${HasSinglePoseCalibEstim}> ${PatSingleCalib} </#WHEN> NKS-Assoc-FromKeyCal@Ori${AeroOut}/AutoCal@.xml false
<#WHEN VTEST=${NotHasSinglePoseCalibEstim}> Ori${AeroOut}/Residus.xml </#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${WithBloc}>

TheBlock true
